summary: New body mesh and textures for female.
descriptionHtml:
A totally new body mesh use the similar UV as vanilla. No serious problem with vanilla armors but will cause a few clothes looks a little strange.
You can use most of texture made for other body replacers, but remember not to replace the normal map(XXX_MSN.dds)
Just put all the file in the archive to Data file. I suggest you backup your original file especially the skeleton mesh.

V 1.3 Updated
Change the shape of meshes and skeleton, some little change in diffuse and normal textures.
The WT100 body mesh now is more plentiful than V 1.2

You can find my cloth mod here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34725/



Credits:
The diffuse textures are modified from http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32986.
Thanks to Maevan2 for his amazing textures.
The skeleton are modified from XP32's maximum female skeleton.
author: mk1mk2
